title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, it does not receive focus as expected.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not receive focus and the caret remains in the previously focused area.
EB: The expected behavior is that when clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret should move to the text field of the first Combo, specifically the 'Host' field.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog and click on the first Combo. Observe that the focus does not shift to the 'Host' field of the first Combo.
